info.description: An overview of API endpoints, verbs and their uses. Note: this is still in-progress and will change over time.
info.title: OSOC - API

tags.name: github
tags.description: Everything about the login with github.

tags.name: verify
tags.description: Everything about verifying the session keys.

get.description: Lists all the admins.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

post.description: Updates the admin in the system.

parameters.name: isCoach
parameters.description: True if the user is a coach, else False.

parameters.name: isAdmin
parameters.description: True if the user is an admin, else False.

parameters.name: accountStatus
parameters.description: Shows the status of the account.

200.description: If the session key is invalid or the id is not an id of an admin, an error is thrown. Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

delete.description: Removes the given admin from the system.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

get.description: Lists all the coaches in the system.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

post.description: Updates the coach in the system.

parameters.name: isCoach
parameters.description: True if the user is a coach, else False.

parameters.name: isAdmin
parameters.description: True if the user is an admin, else False.

parameters.name: accountStatus
parameters.description: Shows the status of the account.

200.description: If the session key is invalid or the id is not an id of a coach, an error is thrown. Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

delete.description: Removes the given coach from the system.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

get.description: Lists all coach requests.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

get.description: Lists all the followups in the system.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

get.description: Lists all details about the followup with the given id.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

post.description: Attempts to update a followup with the given id and type.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

post.description: Attempts to create a new form in the database.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: The date when this form was created.

parameters.name: data
parameters.default: This is actually an object with the data.

200.description: The response is an empty object.

get.description: Redirects towards another github url.
Attempts to get a github exchange access token.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The code for the post request.

post.description: Attempts to log a user in into the system

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: The hashed password of the user to log in.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email of the user to log in.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

parameters.name: sessionkey
parameters.description: The session key of the user to log out.

200.description: Logged out.

get.description: Redirects towards GET /project/all.

post.description: Attempts to insert a new project into the system.

parameters.name: partner
parameters.description: The partner's name of this project.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: The start date of this project.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: The end date of this project.

parameters.name: positions
parameters.description: The amount of positions for the project.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

get.description: Lists all projects in the system.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

get.description: Get the selected project from the system.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

post.description: Updates the project in the system.

parameters.name: partner
parameters.description: The partner's name of this project.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start date of this project.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end date of this project.

parameters.name: positions
parameters.description: The amount of positions for the project.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

delete.description: Removes the given project from the system.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

get.description: Lists all drafted students of the selected project.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

post.description: Add the student to the selected project.

parameters.name: studentId
parameters.description: The id of the selected student.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: The selected role for this student.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

delete.description: Removes the student from the project.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

get.description: Lists all project conflicts.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

get.description: Checks if a reset code is valid.

post.description: Resets the password when the code and password are valid.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

get.description: Redirects towards GET /role/all.
Lists all roles in the system.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

post.description: Create a role in the system.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

get.description: Redirects towards GET /student/all.
Lists all students in the system.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

get.description: Lists all details about the student with the given id.

parameters.name: sessionkey
parameters.description: Your current session key. - Student ID is parsed from the URL.

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4". The 'student.labels' field can be an empty array. The 'student.sollicitation field can be an empty omitted (undefined) if the student has not yet submitted a sollicitation. The 'student.project' field can be omitted (undefined) if the student has not een assigned to a project yet.

delete.description: Removes the given student from the system.

parameters.name: sessionkey
parameters.description: Your current session key. - Student ID is parsed from the URL.

post.description: Login user suggest if the student is suitable for OSOC.

parameters.name: login user id
parameters.description: The id of the one that made the suggestion.

200.description: The suggestion field contains all updated fields. If no field is updated, an Argument error is thrown.

post.description: Admin gives out final yes/maybe/no that decides if the student is suitable for OSOC or not.

parameters.name: login user id
parameters.description: The id of the one that made the confirmation.

200.description: The confirmation field contains all updated fields. If no field is updated, an Argument error is thrown.

get.description: Redirects towards GET /verify/all.
Attempts to verify if the session key is valid

200.description: Updated sessionkey as hex string E.g. "A1BEF4".

student_volunteer_info.default: Yes, I can work with a student employment agreement in Belgium.
Yes, I can work with a student employment agreement in Belgium.
